titleStmt.title: Good news for England: or, The peoples triumph. Then let's be joyful, and in heart content, to see our King united with the Parliament. Long live Charles the Second. To the tune of, Bodkins galliard.
titleStmt.author: Starkey, A.

notesStmt.note: Right half sheet contains: "The second Part, to the same Tune."
Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
